overview: "Devil Sorcery" is an entertaining HK black magic film about a wizard who performs many hideous magic rituals. The student of a good wizard decides to get it on with his master's wife and all hell breaks loose after the tragic death of his master. The ghastly events involve flying heads and graphic centipede puking.

production_companies.name: Kim Hin Film Enterprise Co. Ltd.

title: Devil Sorcery
